bike.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted, semi-integrated tapered headset w/ 1.5" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted w/ sealed bearing pivots, low-leverage suspended rockers, FSR 140mm travel, 142mm dropout, post-style disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: RockShox Revelation RL Dual Air w/ remote lockout w/ tapered alloy steerer w/ 15mm thru axle, 140mm travel
Shimano SLX, M675 hollow Tech II w/ integrated spindle, 38/24T
Shimano Deore XT, M786 SGS Shadow Plus top normal, 10-speed
Shimano SLX M678 32H Center Lock disc 32H hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Schwalbe Nobby Nic, 26" x 2.35" folding, 67 tpi
Shimano SLX M675, hydraulic disc, 200/180mm rotor
Oval M650, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 680mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M613, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M600 w/ satin steel rails
Oval M600, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
